item.title: Shiny modules to reduce duplication in apps
item.description: Shiny apps are awesome, with a bit of training you can build fairly impressive interactive web apps. But at some point, the subject of “shiny modules” will rear its head. When I started learning modules, I found most of the existing articles focus on the technical-side of things and don’t focus on the benefits of using modules - they can significantly simplify and improve your apps. I’m going to put together a few different tutorials on real-world Shiny apps and how modules can be used to improve them.
